'''Friend to Animals''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Feed the puppy
#* Requires {{Item|Fowl|20|x=1}}

==Gameplay Notes==
*The dog can be scared away by an attack before placing the fowl.
**But even when the dog is scared away, the player can still place the fowl to complete the quest.
*The dog can also be scared away after completing the quest.
*The fowl despawns after around half a minute, after which one is able to place another fowl on the plate.
*The following dogs may appear:
**{{Item|Black-Back Hound|type=Wildlife|35}}
**{{Item|Forest-Patrol Hound|type=Wildlife|35}}
**{{Item|Northland Hound|type=Wildlife|35}}
**{{Item|Shiba|type=Wildlife|35}}

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Upon approaching the puppy)
:'''Paimon:''' Huh, there's a dog over there. How did it get here? And it looks really hungry, too...
:'''Paimon:''' Let's get it something to eat.
{{Dialogue End}}
